Action: # Application Deposit Policy Update: Application Deposit Policy Update
application_deposit_policy_update/application_deposit_policy_update
## Change Deposit Policy and Validate via API
Open any application (ensure the deposit policy is different than "Open Policy Finder") and note its application id

Expected Test Results: The current deposit policy is displayed and its value is noted

Action: Note the current value of the deposit policy
Change the deposit policy to "Open Policy Finder"
Save the application
Go to /api/v4/docs#operations-tag-CRUD_Applications and open the "GET" section
Click "Try it out" button
Provide your API key (instructions on your account page)
Provide the application's id
Click "Execute"
Go back to the application form
Change the deposit policy value to something other than "Open Policy Finder"
Save the application
Go to /api/v4/docs#operations-tag-CRUD_Applications and open the "GET" section
Click "Try it out" button
Provide your API key (instructions on your account page)
Provide the application's id
Click "Execute"

Expected Test Results: The new deposit policy value is confirmed in the API response
